ComicInfo.Summary:
All things come to head as the royal fleet is attacked by the Tharks and Dejah Thoris is willing to sacrifice herself for the good of Helium.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Diego Galindo | 1 | B | Cover B | Mike McKone | 2 | C | Cover C | Pasquale Qualano | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Diego Galindo | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Mike McKone | 5 | F/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Pasquale Qualano | 6 |
